FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Everything you need to know about renting a car with us.

items.question: What documents do I need to rent a car in North Cyprus?
items.answer: You will need a valid driver's license held for at least 2 years and a valid passport or ID card. International Driving Permits (IDP) are not typically required for tourists with licenses in English.

items.question: Is insurance included in the rental price?
items.answer: Yes, basic Third Party Insurance is mandatory and included. Collision Damage Waiver (CDW) is often available as an optional extra for peace of mind.

items.question: Can I drive the rental car to South Cyprus?
items.answer: Most North Cyprus rental cars cannot be driven to the South due to insurance limitations. Cross-border policies vary, so please check with the specific provider beforehand.

items.question: Do you offer airport delivery at Ercan Airport?
items.answer: Absolutely! Most of our providers offer free or low-cost delivery to Ercan Airport (ECN). You can pick up your car immediately upon arrival.

items.question: Are there any hidden fees?
items.answer: We pride ourselves on transparency. The price you see includes all mandatory taxes and fees. Any optional extras (child seats, additional drivers) are clearly listed.

northCyprus.metaTitle: Car Rental North Cyprus | Best Rates & Premium Fleet | RentalX
northCyprus.metaDescription: Rent a car in North Cyprus with RentalX. Choose from luxury, SUV, and economy vehicles. Instant booking, transparent pricing, and 24/7 support across Girne, Lefkoşa, and Gazimağusa.
northCyprus.title: Explore North Cyprus in Style
northCyprus.intro: Welcome to RentalX, your premier destination for reliable and premium car rentals in Northern Cyprus (TRNC). Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, our extensive fleet ensures you find the perfect vehicle for the Mediterranean roads.

sections.title: Why Rent a Car in North Cyprus?
sections.content: Exploring Northern Cyprus is best done by car. From the historic harbor of Kyrenia to the golden sands of Karpaz, having your own vehicle gives you the freedom to discover hidden gems at your own pace. Public transport is limited, making car rental the most practical choice for tourists and professionals alike.

sections.title: Our Fleet Collections
sections.content: We offer a diverse range of vehicles to suit every need. Choose our Luxury Collection for a prestigious experience, our SUV & 4x4 options for mountain adventures, or our Economy range for budget-friendly travel without compromising on quality.

sections.title: Transparent Pricing & No Hidden Fees
sections.content: At RentalX, we believe in honesty. The price you see is the price you pay. All rentals include basic insurance, and we offer clear upgrades for full coverage. Our booking process is streamlined to get you on the road as quickly as possible.

items.q: Can I pick up my car at Ercan Airport?
items.a: Yes, we provide 24/7 delivery and pickup services at Ercan Airport (ECN). Your driver will meet you at the arrivals gate.

items.q: What side of the road do you drive on in North Cyprus?
items.a: Like the UK, we drive on the left side of the road in North Cyprus.

kyrenia.metaTitle: Car Rental Kyrenia (Girne) | Premium Vehicle Hire | RentalX
kyrenia.metaDescription: Looking for car rental in Kyrenia? RentalX offers the best selection of luxury and economy cars in Girne. Pick up at the harbor, city center, or your hotel.
kyrenia.title: Your Journey in the Pearl of the Mediterranean
kyrenia.intro: Kyrenia is the most popular tourist destination in North Cyprus. With RentalX, you can enjoy a seamless rental experience right in the heart of Girne.

sections.title: Explore Kyrenia Harbor & Castle
sections.content: With a rental car, you can easily visit the iconic Kyrenia Harbor and the majestic Kyrenia Castle. Avoid the heat and travel in comfort with our modern, air-conditioned fleet.

nicosia.metaTitle: Car Rental Nicosia (Lefkoşa) | Business & City Car Hire | RentalX
nicosia.metaDescription: Rent a car in Nicosia with RentalX. Best rates for business travelers and tourists in the capital. Convenient city center pickup and drop-off.
nicosia.title: Drive Through the Capital
nicosia.intro: As the business and administrative heart of North Cyprus, Nicosia requires reliable mobility. RentalX provides professional service for both corporate and leisure travelers.

sections.title: Perfect for Business & City Exploration
sections.content: Navigate the bustling streets of Lefkoşa with ease. Our compact city cars are perfect for parking, while our executive sedans offer the comfort needed for professional meetings.

famagusta.metaTitle: Car Rental Famagusta (Gazimağusa) | Explore the Historic East | RentalX
famagusta.metaDescription: Explore Famagusta with RentalX. Rent a car to visit the Old City, Salamis Ruins, and the stunning beaches of the east coast.
famagusta.title: Historical Adventures in Gazimağusa
famagusta.intro: Famagusta offers a unique blend of history and beaches. Having a car is essential to explore the vast archaeological sites of Salamis and the ghost town of Varosha.

sections.title: Your Gateway to the East Coast
sections.content: Gazimağusa is the perfect base for exploring the eastern part of the island. Our SUVs and reliable sedans are ready to take you on your next historical adventure.

ercan.metaTitle: Ercan Airport Car Rental | 24/7 Terminal Pickup | RentalX
ercan.metaDescription: Rent your car at Ercan Airport (ECN) with RentalX. 24/7 service, no waiting, and direct terminal pickup. Book online for the best rates.
ercan.title: Start Your Trip the Moment You Land
ercan.intro: Don't waste time waiting for taxis. With RentalX, your car will be waiting for you at Ercan Airport terminal the moment you arrive.

sections.title: Seamless Airport Transfers
sections.content: Our airport team monitors your flight in real-time. Whether you land early or late, we ensure a smooth handover right at the terminal exit.

luxury.metaTitle: Luxury Car Rental North Cyprus | Premium & Exotic Cars | RentalX
luxury.metaDescription: Experience ultimate luxury in North Cyprus. Rent Porsche, Mercedes, and Range Rover with RentalX. VIP service and pristine vehicles.
luxury.title: Drive Excellence
luxury.intro: The Mediterranean roads deserve a car that matches the view. Our luxury fleet is curated for those who settle for nothing but the best.

sections.title: A Fleet of Prestige
sections.content: From high-performance sports cars to executive SUVs, our luxury collection offers the latest models with top-tier specifications.

cheap.metaTitle: Cheap Car Rental North Cyprus | Budget-Friendly Rates | RentalX
cheap.metaDescription: Affordable car rental in North Cyprus. Best rates for economy cars. No hidden fees, free cancellation, and reliable service.
cheap.title: Quality Travel on a Budget
cheap.intro: Traveling in North Cyprus shouldn't be expensive. RentalX offers the most competitive rates for reliable economy vehicles.

sections.title: Best Value Guarantee
sections.content: Our economy fleet is regularly serviced and fuel-efficient, ensuring you save on both rental costs and pump prices.

suv.metaTitle: SUV Rental North Cyprus | 4x4 & Family Vehicles | RentalX

suv.title: Space, Comfort & Power
suv.intro: Whether you're traveling with family or heading to the Five-Finger Mountains, our SUV collection provides the space and power you need.

sections.title: Unmatched Versatility
sections.content: Our SUVs are equipped for the diverse terrain of North Cyprus, offering safety for families and performance for the adventurous.

sections.title: Tailored Long-Stay Packages

selfDrive.metaTitle: Self-Drive Car Rental Cyprus | Tour the Island at Your Pace | RentalX
selfDrive.metaDescription: Self-drive car hire in North Cyprus. Hire a car and explore the beauties of the island. Flexible pickup and wide vehicle selection.
selfDrive.title: You Are in Control of the Journey
selfDrive.intro: Experience true independence. Rent any car from our fleet and create your own itinerary across North Cyprus.

sections.title: Total Freedom
sections.content: With no fixed tours or schedules, self-driving allows you to discover the authentic culture and hidden natural wonders of Cyprus.
